revised_title: Interpretation of the Spectrum of Ionised Oxygen (O II) and its Correlation with Theoretical Terms
tldr: The authors, R. H. Fowler and D. R. Hartree, analyze the spectrum of ionized oxygen (O II) and correlate the observed terms with the theoretical terms based on the Heisenberg-Hund theory of complex spectra. The study provides a satisfactory agreement between the observed and theoretical terms, demonstrating the significance of the correlation.
